hero.title: Geek & Dragon Shop
hero.description: Give your sessions the elegance and durability of coins and equipment cards designed in Quebec, more precious than a $300 dragon miniature used only on rare occasions; our coins appear in every session for years of adventures.

intro.title: Official shop
intro.description: Collectible items and handcrafted game aids, made in Quebec.

pieces.title: Metal coins
pieces.description: A role-playing game without physical coins is like Monopoly without banknotes. Treat yourself to the authentic weight of treasure.

chest.title: Custom chests
chest.description: Need more than 50 coins? Custom chests are available on request.

cards.title: Equipment cards
cards.description1: Our scribes are still enchanting these adventure parchments.
cards.description2: The equipment cards will forge their way in by the next moon.

triptychs.title: Character triptychs
triptychs.description1: The artisans are still shaping these hero grimoires.
triptychs.description2: The triptychs will join the shop shortly.

collective.title: Invest together, share the adventure
collective.description1: Don't let the game master go broke for your pleasure: each player will soon be able to contribute by buying their triptych, cards and coins.
collective.description2: By comparison, some dragon figurines sell for over $300 each and are generally used only once in an entire campaign—and even then, only when the scenario allows it, because it's not systematic. Our coins, however, are used in every session for years of campaigning.
collective.description3: Fill out the ownership card opposite by writing your name and the number of coins purchased, sign it and hand your treasures to the game master. At the end of the campaign, they will return them to you without difficulty.
